thread.title: The Wall Street Journal: Kroger to stop selling guns and ammo to people younger than 21

title: The Wall Street Journal: Kroger to stop selling guns and ammo to people younger than 21

organizations.name: washington bloomberg  by heather haddon  kroger co.

text:
Kroger Co. said it would stop selling guns to buyers under 21 years old through its Fred Meyer locations, the third major retailer to tighten its policies while lawmakers continue to debate how to respond to the latest school shooting in America. 

The U.S.â€™s largest supermarket chain said it would raise the minimum age to purchase arms and ammunition in all of its Fred Meyer stores in response to the Parkland, Fla., high-school tragedy. Kroger currently sells firearms at 43 Fred Meyer locations in Alaska, Idaho, Oregon and... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
